name: CEM Colors
description: Get the artist color scheme for the objects of the CEM framework.

outputParameters.name: color_tension
outputParameters.description: The color for edges under a tension force.

outputParameters.name: color_compression
outputParameters.description: The color for edges under a compression force.

outputParameters.name: color_edge
outputParameters.description: The color for a regular edge.

outputParameters.name: color_node
outputParameters.description: The color for a regular node.

outputParameters.name: color_node_support
outputParameters.description: The color for a support node.

outputParameters.name: color_node_origin
outputParameters.description: The color for an origin node.

outputParameters.name: color_load
outputParameters.description: The color for an applied load.

outputParameters.name: color_reaction
outputParameters.description: The color for a reaction force.

outputParameters.name: color_trail
outputParameters.description: The color to paint a trail.

outputParameters.name: color_auxiliary_trail
outputParameters.description: The color to paint an auxiliary trail.
